headline: Is Strong 2025 Earnings and Softer 2026 Outlook Reshaping the Investment Case for SBA (SBAC)?
summary: In late February 2026, SBA Communications Corporation reported that fourth-quarter 2025 revenue rose to US$719.58 million and net income more than doubled to US$370.29 million, while full-year 2025 net income reached US$1.05 billion and diluted EPS from continuing operations increased to US$9.80. Alongside this earnings strength, the company issued 2026 guidance that implies lower net income than 2025 and raised its quarterly dividend by about 13% to US$1.25 per share, highlighting a balance...
